title: resbook
description: New Zealand owned and operated cloud based reservation management system designed specifically for accommodation providers and Property Managers worldwide.

title: yha
description:
YHA is New Zealand's largest chain of backpackers hostels providing accommodation in 38 location. 
As a Front-end architect I was responsible for converting designs/concepts into responsive/adaptive web pages & interfaces.

title: sculptureum
description: Sculptureum is one of the New Zealand's elegant Gardens, Galleries and Rothko Restaurant which is built on 25-acre property at Matakana in April 2017.

title: ymca
description: YMCA Auckland is a not-for-profit hostel which is helping kiwi families and teens by contributing to valued programmes like Family Camp, Raise Up and Fee Assistance for after-school care.

title: release wanaka
description: Release Wanaka provides luxury accommodation and bespoke travel experiences in Wanaka.

title: paradise
description: Paradise Motorcycle Tours is New Zealand's one of the biggest tour operator providing Guided/Self-guided motorcycle tours.
